name: HiKarl-YourEveningGenie
0:
”Alexa Open Hi Karl”
”Alexa Ask Hi Karl what's happening in Nashville tonight”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hi karl
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hi Karl is a virtual concierge that offers personalized event recommendations. Hi Karl leverages your listening habits, geographic data, and behavioral data to make recommendations of which concerts to go check.

You can ask Hi Karl what’s happening in town, who’s playing at a specific venue, if an artist is in town… and Karl will get back to you in seconds!

e.g.
"Alexa, open Hi Karl"
"Alexa, ask Hi Karl what's happening in Nashville tonight?"
"Alexa, ask Hi Karl who's playing at Mercy Lounge this weekend?"

Hi Karl covers at the moment Nashville and New York City, with lots of other cities in the pipeline!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
